original_title: Philosophers - Debates and Dialogues: Leszek Kolakowski and Henri Lefebvre
overview: Polish philosopher Leszek Kolakowski and French thinker Henri Lefebvre (both former Communist Party members) debate the ongoing significance of Marxism and the concept of alienationâ€”while at the same time struggling to define what a future, post-capitalist society might hold.
title: Philosophers - Debates and Dialogues: Leszek Kolakowski and Henri Lefebvre
